TopicTitle: [0.24] Can't do science in science sandbox

Articles.Content:
I have problem with the Science mode. My kerbals can go on EVA and everything but i can't get science. Right clicking on command capsule brings up window with data about it but i can't see the "Crew report" button. Other like "rename" and "control from here" are there and working. After EVA i can't do the report and mystery goo doesn't have any pop-up menu. Did i miss something or is it a bug?

Also it doesn't matter if i have any mods or not. Help please!
